00034 #include "EuropaReactor.hh"
00035 
00036 #include <PLASMA/RuleInstance.hh>
00037 #include <PLASMA/ConstrainedVariable.hh>
00038 #include <PLASMA/Token.hh>
00039 #include <PLASMA/TokenVariable.hh>
00040 
00041 #include <PLASMA/Debug.hh>
00042 
00043 using namespace TREX::europa;
00044 using namespace TREX::transaction;
00045 
00046 EuropaReactor *DeliberationFilter::s_current = NULL;
00047 
00048 void DeliberationFilter::set_current(EuropaReactor *me) {
00049   s_current = me;
00050 }
00051 
00052 DeliberationFilter::DeliberationFilter(EUROPA::TiXmlElement const &cfg)
00053   :EUROPA::SOLVERS::FlawFilter(cfg, true), m_assembly(s_current->assembly()) {
00054   // TREX::utils::SingletonUse<details::Schema> schema;
00055   debugMsg("trex:horizon", "Created for reactor "<<s_current->getName()
00056           <<"\nid is "<<getId());
00057   setExpression(toString()+":horizon_"+s_current->getName().str());
00058   s_current->set_filter(this);  
00059 }
00060 
00061 void DeliberationFilter::set_horizon(TICK start, TICK end) {
00062   debugMsg("trex:horizon", "horizon set to ["<<start<<", "<<end<<")");;
00063   m_horizon = EUROPA::IntervalIntDomain(start, end);
00064 }
00065 
00066 bool DeliberationFilter::test(EUROPA::EntityId const &entity) {
00067   EUROPA::TokenId token;
00068 
00069   debugMsg("trex:horizon", "check for "<<entity->getKey());
00070   // std::cerr<<"Filtering "<<entity->toString()<<std::endl;
00071   if( EUROPA::ConstrainedVariableId::convertable(entity) ) {
00072     EUROPA::ConstrainedVariableId var = entity;
00073 
00074     // exclude singletons
00075     if( var->lastDomain().isSingleton() ) {
00076       debugMsg("trex:horizon", "excluding singleton "<<var->getName().toString());
00077       return true;
00078     }
00079 
00080     EUROPA::EntityId parent = var->parent();
00081     if( parent.isNoId() || EUROPA::ObjectId::convertable(parent) ) {
00082       debugMsg("trex:horizon", "global variable "<<var->getName().toString());
00083       return true;
00084     }
00085 
00086     if( EUROPA::RuleInstanceId::convertable(parent) ) 
00087       token = EUROPA::RuleInstanceId(parent)->getToken();
00088     else 
00089       token = parent;
00090     
00091     if( !token->isActive() ) {
00092       debugMsg("trex:horizon", "excluding inactive token "<<token->toString());
00093       return true;
00094     }
00095   } else 
00096     token = entity;
00097   if( m_assembly.ignored(token) ) {
00098     debugMsg("trex:horizon", "excluding ignored token "<<token->toString());
00099     return true;
00100   }
00101   EUROPA::IntervalIntDomain const &start_time = token->start()->lastDomain();
00102   EUROPA::IntervalIntDomain const &end_time = token->end()->lastDomain();
00103   
00104   if( end_time.getUpperBound() < m_horizon.getLowerBound() ||
00105       start_time.getLowerBound() >= m_horizon.getUpperBound() ) {
00106     debugMsg("trex:horizon", "excluding out of window token "<<token->toString());
00107     return true;
00108   }
00109   return false;
00110 }
